nodes.text: Teelasin was a female Tarasin, who worked as a customs officer on the planet Cularin.

Teelasin lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic and worked as a customs officer at Hedrett Groundport. In about 32 BBY, while she was at work, the Heroes of Cularin alerted her to the presence of a thief in the port's Customs Receiving Area, a large warehouse that was located on the edge of the port.
Teelasin liked to watch romantic holovids.
